titleStmt.title: An armoure of proufe very profitable, as well for princes, noble men; and gentlemen, as all other in authoritie, shewing the firme fortresse of defence, and hauen of rest in these troublesome times and perilous dayes. Made by Iohn VVoolton minister of the Gospell.
titleStmt.author: Woolton, John, 1535?-1594.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
